name: 3 Jewels 2
description:
3 Jewels Deluxe is a sequel to the popular Match-3 Jewels puzzle game 3 Jewels with 300 new levels and the even more jewel crushing gameplay.

Swap jewels to match 3 or more & create waves of matches in this jeweled puzzle game. Crush 300 Jewelled Challenge Levels & become the 3 Jewels Leaderboard Champion or simply enjoy the Arcade mode for relaxing Jewel Matching.

How to Play:

• Swap and Match 3 or more jewels of the same type!
• Match more jewels for crazy combo points
• Use Special Jewels for Additional Points

Features:

• 2 Game Modes
• 300 Challenge Levels
• Share your Score on Leaderboards
• Move Hints
• Special Jewels
• Slide to Move
• No In App Purchases
• Minimal Permissions
